data.name: Phil Demo
data.detailed_description:
Imagine, if you will, a sort of dance-off / racing-simulator game crossed with a turret defence, with a splash of world building chucked in there. Sounds awful, right? Luckily, this game is nothing like that.

Play as Phil, an office worker who, on an otherwise unremarkable Thursday afternoon, gets abducted from their place of work to compete on a saddistic intergalactic TV show. Fight your way past a bunch of ridiculous enemies, using a selection of even more ridiclous weapons. Survive to the end, and your name will go down in the annals of history. Or die, and repeat the process again. For ever. And ever.
